text: Ezɨ a kamaghɨn na mɨgei, “Nɨ fo, kɨ tizim bagha nɨ bagha ize? Kɨ Guizɨn Akar Akɨnafarimɨn aven osirizir, akar mabar gun deraghvɨra nɨ mɨkɨmasa ize. Egh kɨ dughiar ruarimɨn ikeghan kogham. Kɨ zuamɨra uamategh mangɨva, aser kurar Persian kantrin garim ko mɨsogham. Eghtɨ mɨdorozir kam gɨvaghtɨ, Grighɨn kantrin garir aser kuram otogham. Tav nan akurazir puvatɨ. Ensel Maikel, a Israelia ian gari, egha a uabɨra nan akura.”
